title: What was in the Hoyts viewing party show bag?
body: As the title says, really curious.

replies.body:
In mine, I got an Academy Ahri skin code (plus champion); a lanyard with Lucian and Thresh; wrist band stating "WARDS SAVE LIVES"; two inflatable batons that came in red and white (they glowed when you smacked them together); and a Jinx Chomper which feels like a stress ball.
I believe all bags were standard and extra prizes were given out through games and trivia (such as the Bilgewater envelopes which include replicas of TF's cards;  written letters between the Graves and TF; and a replica Kraken coin).
This was at Hoyts Carousel, at least.
